subject: URGENT: Port Congestion at Shanghai - Oil Shipment Delayed
body:
Dear Operations Team,

We regret to inform you that vessel MV OCEAN STAR carrying 50,000 barrels of crude oil (Shipment ID: SHP-2025-1042) is experiencing delays at Shanghai Port due to severe congestion. Original ETA was Oct 22, now estimated Oct 27 (+5 days).

Cargo: Crude Oil, WTI Grade
Quantity: 50,000 barrels
Current Location: Shanghai Port Anchorage
Destination: Los Angeles

Please advise on rerouting options.

Best regards,
Global Shipping Logistics

subject: Weather Alert: Hurricane approaching Gulf of Mexico
body:
WEATHER ADVISORY

Hurricane category 3 is approaching the Gulf of Mexico. Expected landfall: Oct 24.

Affected Routes:
- Houston to Miami shipping lane
- All Gulf Coast terminals

Recommendation: Delay departures or reroute via Atlantic.

Risk Level: HIGH

subject: Commodity Price Update - Oct 20
body:
Daily Market Update

Crude Oil (WTI): $78.50/barrel (+2.3% due to Middle East tensions)
Natural Gas: $3.20/MMBtu (-0.5%)
Copper: $4.15/lb (+1.1%)

Geopolitical Risk: Elevated due to Suez Canal disruption concerns.

Market Sentiment: Bullish on oil, neutral on metals.
